016package io.micronaut.maven;
017
018import io.micronaut.maven.core.MicronautRuntime;
019import io.micronaut.maven.jib.JibMicronautExtension;
020import io.micronaut.maven.services.ApplicationConfigurationService;
021import io.micronaut.maven.services.CompilerService;
022import io.micronaut.maven.services.DockerService;
023import io.micronaut.maven.jib.JibConfigurationService;
024import io.micronaut.maven.services.ExecutorService;
025import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
026import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecution;
027import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
028import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Execute;
029import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.LifecyclePhase;
030import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
031import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.ResolutionScope;
032import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
033import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.MavenInvocationException;
034import org.graalvm.buildtools.utils.NativeImageUtils;
035
036import javax.inject.Inject;
037import java.io.File;
038import java.io.IOException;
039import java.nio.file.Files;
040import java.nio.file.Path;
041import java.nio.file.Paths;
042import java.util.ArrayList;
043import java.util.List;
044import java.util.Optional;
045import java.util.stream.Collectors;
046import java.util.stream.Stream;
047
048import static io.micronaut.maven.DockerNativeMojo.ARGS_FILE_PROPERTY_NAME;
049
050/**
051 * <p>Generates a <code>Dockerfile</code> depending on the <code>packaging</code> and <code>micronaut.runtime</code>
052 * properties.
053 *
054 * <pre>mvn mn:dockerfile -Dpackaging=docker-native -Dmicronaut.runtime=lambda</pre>
055 *
056 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
057 * @since 1.1
058 */
059@Mojo(name = "dockerfile", requiresDependencyResolution = ResolutionScope.COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME)
060@Execute(phase = LifecyclePhase.PROCESS_CLASSES)
061public class DockerfileMojo extends AbstractDockerMojo {
062
063    public static final String DOCKERFILE = "Dockerfile";
064    public static final String DOCKERFILE_AWS_CUSTOM_RUNTIME = "DockerfileNativeLambda";
065    public static final String DOCKERFILE_AWS = "DockerfileLambda";
066    public static final String DOCKERFILE_ORACLE_CLOUD = "DockerfileOracleCloud";
067    public static final String DOCKERFILE_NATIVE = "DockerfileNative";
068    public static final String DOCKERFILE_CRAC = "DockerfileCrac";
069    public static final String DOCKERFILE_CRAC_CHECKPOINT = "DockerfileCracCheckpoint";
070    public static final String DOCKERFILE_CRAC_CHECKPOINT_FILE = "Dockerfile.crac.checkpoint";
071    public static final String DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_DISTROLESS = "DockerfileNativeDistroless";
072    public static final String DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_STATIC = "DockerfileNativeStatic";
073    public static final String DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_ORACLE_CLOUD = "DockerfileNativeOracleCloud";
074    public static final String NATIVE_BUILD_TOOLS_MAVEN_PLUGIN = "org.graalvm.buildtools:native-maven-plugin";
075
076    private final ExecutorService executorService;
077    private final CompilerService compilerService;
078
079    @Inject
080    public DockerfileMojo(MavenProject mavenProject, DockerService dockerService, JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService,
081                          ApplicationConfigurationService applicationConfigurationService, ExecutorService executorService,
082                          MavenSession mavenSession, MojoExecution mojoExecution, CompilerService compilerService) {
083        super(mavenProject, jibConfigurationService, applicationConfigurationService, dockerService, mavenSession, mojoExecution);
084        this.executorService = executorService;
085        this.compilerService = compilerService;
086    }
087
088    @Override
089    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
090        MicronautRuntime runtime = MicronautRuntime.valueOf(micronautRuntime.toUpperCase());
091        Packaging packaging = Packaging.of(mavenProject.getPackaging());
092        try {
093            copyDependencies();
094            Optional<File> dockerfile = switch (packaging) {
095                case DOCKER_NATIVE -> buildDockerfileNative(runtime);
096                case DOCKER -> buildDockerfile(runtime);
097                case DOCKER_CRAC -> buildCracDockerfile(runtime);
098                default -> throw new MojoExecutionException("Packaging is set to [" + packaging + "]. To generate a Dockerfile, set the packaging to either [" + Packaging.DOCKER.id() + "] or [" + Packaging.DOCKER_NATIVE.id() + "]");
099            };
100
101            dockerfile.ifPresent(file -> getLog().info("Dockerfile written to: " + file.getAbsolutePath()));
102
103        } catch (IOException | MavenInvocationException e) {
104            throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
105        }
106    }
107
108    private Optional<File> buildDockerfile(MicronautRuntime runtime) throws IOException {
109        File dockerfile;
110        switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
111            case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> {
112                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE_ORACLE_CLOUD);
113                oracleCloudFunctionCmd(dockerfile);
114                processOracleFunctionDockerfile(dockerfile);
115            }
116            case LAMBDA -> {
117                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE_AWS);
118                processDockerfile(dockerfile);
119            }
120            case DEFAULT -> {
121                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE);
122                processDockerfile(dockerfile);
123            }
124            default -> throw new IllegalStateException("Unexpected value: " + runtime.getBuildStrategy());
125        }
126        return Optional.ofNullable(dockerfile);
127    }
128
129    private Optional<File> buildCracDockerfile(MicronautRuntime runtime) throws IOException, MojoExecutionException {
130        File dockerfile;
131        switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
132            case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> throw new MojoExecutionException("Oracle Functions are currently unsupported");
133            case LAMBDA -> throw new MojoExecutionException("Lambda Functions are currently unsupported");
134            case DEFAULT -> {
135                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE_CRAC_CHECKPOINT, DOCKERFILE_CRAC_CHECKPOINT_FILE);
136                processDockerfile(dockerfile);
137                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE_CRAC);
138                processDockerfile(dockerfile);
139            }
140            default -> throw new IllegalStateException("Unexpected value: " + runtime.getBuildStrategy());
141        }
142        return Optional.ofNullable(dockerfile);
143    }
144
145    static void processOracleFunctionDockerfile(File dockerfile) throws IOException {
146        if (dockerfile != null) {
147            List<String> allLines = Files.readAllLines(dockerfile.toPath());
148            String projectFnVersion = JibMicronautExtension.determineProjectFnVersion(System.getProperty("java.version"));
149            allLines.add(0, allLines.remove(0) + projectFnVersion);
150            String entrypoint = JibMicronautExtension.buildProjectFnEntrypoint()
151                    .stream()
152                    .map(s -> "\"" + s + "\"")
153                    .collect(Collectors.joining(", "));
154
155            allLines.add("ENTRYPOINT [" + entrypoint + "]");
156
157            Files.write(dockerfile.toPath(), allLines);
158        }
159    }
160
161    private Optional<File> buildDockerfileNative(MicronautRuntime runtime) throws IOException, MavenInvocationException {
162        getLog().info("Generating GraalVM args file");
163        executorService.invokeGoal(NATIVE_BUILD_TOOLS_MAVEN_PLUGIN, "write-args-file");
164        File dockerfile;
165        switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
166            case LAMBDA -> dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE_AWS_CUSTOM_RUNTIME);
167            case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> {
168                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_ORACLE_CLOUD);
169                oracleCloudFunctionCmd(dockerfile);
170            }
171            case DEFAULT -> {
172                String dockerfileName = DOCKERFILE_NATIVE;
173                if (Boolean.TRUE.equals(staticNativeImage)) {
174                    getLog().info("Generating a static native image");
175                    dockerfileName = DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_STATIC;
176                } else if (baseImageRun.contains("distroless")) {
177                    getLog().info("Generating a mostly static native image");
178                    dockerfileName = DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_DISTROLESS;
179                }
180                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(dockerfileName);
181            }
182            default -> throw new IllegalStateException("Unexpected value: " + runtime.getBuildStrategy());
183        }
184        processDockerfile(dockerfile);
185        return Optional.ofNullable(dockerfile);
186    }
187
188    private void processDockerfile(File dockerfile) throws IOException {
189
190        if (dockerfile != null) {
191            List<String> allLines = Files.readAllLines(dockerfile.toPath());
192            List<String> result = new ArrayList<>();
193
194            for (String line : allLines) {
195                if (!line.startsWith("ARG")) {
196                    if (line.contains("BASE_IMAGE_RUN")) {
197                        result.add(line.replace("${BASE_IMAGE_RUN}", baseImageRun));
198                    } else if (line.contains("BASE_IMAGE")) {
199                        result.add(line.replace("${BASE_IMAGE}", getFrom()));
200                    } else if (line.contains("BASE_JAVA_IMAGE")) {
201                        result.add(line.replace("${BASE_JAVA_IMAGE}", getBaseImage()));
202                    } else if (line.contains("GRAALVM_") || line.contains("CLASS_NAME")) {
203                        result.add(line
204                                .replace("${GRAALVM_JVM_VERSION}", graalVmJvmVersion())
205                                .replace("${GRAALVM_ARCH}", graalVmArch())
206                                .replace("${CLASS_NAME}", mainClass)
207                        );
208                    } else if (line.contains("PORT")) {
209                        result.add(line.replace("${PORT}", getPort()));
210                    } else {
211                        result.add(line);
212                    }
213                }
214            }
215
216            String argsFile = mavenProject.getProperties().getProperty(ARGS_FILE_PROPERTY_NAME);
217            if (argsFile == null) {
218                Path targetPath = Paths.get(mavenProject.getBuild().getDirectory());
219                try (Stream<Path> listStream = Files.list(targetPath)) {
220                    Path argsFilePath = listStream
221                            .map(path -> path.getFileName().toString())
222                            .filter(f -> f.startsWith("native-image") && f.endsWith("args"))
223                            .map(targetPath::resolve)
224                            .findFirst()
225                            .orElse(null);
226                    if (argsFilePath != null) {
227                        argsFile = argsFilePath.toAbsolutePath().toString();
228                    }
229                }
230            }
231            if (argsFile != null) {
232                List<String> allNativeImageBuildArgs = MojoUtils.computeNativeImageArgs(nativeImageBuildArgs, baseImageRun, argsFile);
233                //Remove extra main class argument
234                allNativeImageBuildArgs.remove(mainClass);
235                getLog().info("GraalVM native image build args: " + allNativeImageBuildArgs);
236                List<String> conversionResult = NativeImageUtils.convertToArgsFile(allNativeImageBuildArgs, Paths.get(mavenProject.getBuild().getDirectory()));
237                if (conversionResult.size() == 1) {
238                    Files.delete(Paths.get(argsFile));
239                }
240            }
241
242            Files.write(dockerfile.toPath(), result);
243        }
244    }
245}
